name: Freight Hopper
description:
Hop, slide, and parkour on trains to reach the goal as fast as possible. In our first-person physics parkour game, challenge yourself to earn and maintain speed on moving train platforms. Replay over and over, to find the best route and beat your personal best times. Engage with a unique movement system that rewards maintaining momentum and spontaneous planning. We encourage speed running and posting your best times!

Enjoy this quick 10-level, single-player experience as a way to relax or compete against your best times.

Listen to Freight Hopper music Here
